description: wood carved into horn shape; silver fish applied to one side, with pair of twisted wire decorative elements around horn; large silver metal cap at smaller end decorated with designs of pairs of repeating arcs, with a decorative organic element with studs at tip end; collar decorated with similar repeating arcs; cover decorated with wire flower with studs; chain has silver ball near one end
dimension:
9 13/16 x 2 11/16 x 1 13/16 in. (24.92 x 6.83 x 4.6 cm) (without chain)
25 11/16 in. (65.25 cm) (object part, chain length)
marks:
Inscription and Sticker

on collar at wide end,
title: Horn-shaped pendant with chain
